articles.author: Jason Ma
articles.title: Soaring U.S. debt doesn’t just put America at risk. It could trigger contagion across global markets, IIF warns - AOL.com
articles.description: Borrowing costs in certain countries often move in tandem, meaning volatility in Treasury bonds will create ripples in other debt.
articles.content: <ul><li>Treasury yields spiked recently amid mounting fears that investor demand for U.S. debt is waning just as supply is taking off, with a budget bill in Congress expected to add trillions to the … [+3037 chars]
